20 (extended) | duration = | event = | characters = [[Gandalf]], [[Aragorn]], [[Legolas]], [[Gimli]], [[Éowyn]], [[Háma]], [[Gríma|Wormtongue]], [[Théoden]] | previous = [[Ent Draft]] | next = [[The Funeral of Théodred]] }} '''The King of the Golden Hall''' is the fifteenth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the twentieth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition. [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers scenes|20]]
